rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: By the end of October, US retail prices for female turkeys had shot up 28 per cent year on year, according to US Department of Agriculture data.

rationale: The vivid verb 'shot up' describes the impact (price increase) alarmingly.
statement_text: By the end of October, US retail prices for female turkeys had shot up 28 per cent year on year, according to US Department of Agriculture data.
